name: B. Squares and Cubes
statement:
Polycarp likes squares and cubes of positive integers. Here is the
beginning of the sequence of numbers he likes: 1, 4, 8, 9, ....For a
given number n, count the number of integers from 1 to n that Polycarp
likes. In other words, find the number of such x that x is a square of a
positive integer number or a cube of a positive integer number (or both
a square and a cube simultaneously).
